facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line declined from 85.1 % in 1994 to 49.7% in 2009.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 49.6 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line declined from 55.6 % in 2001 to 43.6% in 2009.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Mali has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 6 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 30.4 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 decreased from 3.1 % in 2001 to 1.9% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 1010 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 587 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 219.5 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 106 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , there were about 0.55 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 27.5 % in 2000 to 24.6% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 50.11945 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics, by education level (ratio)
facts.fact_text: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics at the end of primary education was 1.01587 in 2016 , meaning 101.587 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics.

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in reading, by education level (ratio)
facts.fact_text: Gender parity index for achievement in reading at the end of primary education was 0.93496 in 2016 , meaning 93.496 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in reading.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 51.5 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament declined from 12.2449 % in 2000 to 8.8435% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 10.28 % in 2000 to 35.07% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , less than 5 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.77577 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.78956 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate was 1.4 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from -2.83 % in 2000 to 3.79% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.29 % of GDP , up from 0.22 % in 2007

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 100.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums declined from 94.2 % in 1990 to 56.3% in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 31.1731166839600 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Mali has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.77577 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.78956 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2015 , Mali has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 4.83531 % in 2000 to 3.86415% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 43.7186 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 33.77388 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 10.90 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , there were about 87.2 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 6.67 % of GDP , up from 3.99 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services declined from 14.66 % in 1990 to 4.20% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.22 % of the population , up from 0.02% of the population in 2006 .

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with national statistical plans that are fully funded (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2018 , Mali does not have national statistical plans that are fully funded.
